tags.name: Cafe Neo
tags.note: Cafe Neo is the oldest cafe that the immigrants from Asia Minor used meet and make music. Recently it is local inhabitant cafe where you can meet the neighborhood old people.

tags.description: This is 1 of only 2 authentic "kafeneios" left in Ammoudara. Sit down there and enjoy a relaxed afternoon with some "mezèdes" and a glass of chilled white country wine.
tags.name: Μεζεδοπωλείο Λάζαρος
news cafe
tags.wheelchair:description: Das "news cafe" hat seitlich einen Eingang mit einer Rampe und ein Behindertengerechtes WC das sogar mittels Aufkleber an den Eingängen zum Cafe gekenzeichnet ist...

tags.fixme: δεν βρίσκεται στη σελίδα τους, μήπως έχει κλείσει;

ΤΟ ΜΑΓΑΖΑΚΙ που λέγαμε...
tags.name:en: THE MAGAZAKI we were talking about...

tags.description: very special restaurant, usually a dinner takes 3-5 hours with lots of small seasonal dishes, no order, you eat what the cook is creating for your group - reservation by phone a few days in advance absolutely necessary!
tags.name: Καφένες
